Sweetie Peep - 번들팩 - 환희의 바이올렛
Sweetie Peep - Bundle Pack - Vavoom Violet

Sweetie Peep - Bundle Pack - Vavoom Violet
kDesc

Sweetie Pie will melt your heart as your favorite new Peep! It's three for one with extra Peep fun! Bring your Heavy Pet Peep into your apartment and let the fun begin. You can control your Peep with custom animations and moves. Take her outside of your apartment as a Companion or place her on display in your apartment in his Peep-a-Boo box. Collect them all and stack them for all to see!
This set includes the following items.


・Sweetie Peep - Vavoom Violet
 ・Sweetie Peep - Static Mini - Vavoom Violet
 ・Sweetie Peep - Heavy Pet - Vavoom Violet


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle. [#Legal]

Sweetie Pie va faire fondre ton cœur comme ta nouvelle Peep favorite! C'est trois en un avec Peep Fun supplémentaire! Ramène ton Heavy Pet Peep à ton appartement et que la fête commence. Tu peux contrôler ta peep avec des animations personnalisées et manœuvres spéciales. Prends la à l'extérieur de ton appartement comme Compagne ou expose la à ton appartement dans sa boîte Peep-a-Boo box. Rassemble les tous et entasse les pour que tous puissent les voir.[#Legal]

Sweetie Pie wird dein Herz als neues Lieblings-Peep erobern! Sie kommt im Dreier-Pack mit extra Peep-Spaß! Bring dein Heavy Pet Peep in deine Wohnung und der Spaß beginnt. Du kannst dein Peep mit benutzerdefinierten Animationen und Bewegungen steuern. Nimm sie als Gefährtin mit nach draußen oder stelle sie in deiner Wohnung in ihrer Peep-a-Boo Kiste aus. Sammle sie alle und stelle sie für Alle zur Schau aus! [#Legal]

Sweetie Pie ti scioglierá il cuore come il tuo nuovo e preferito Peep! Divertimento extra Peep al tre per uno! Porta il tuo Heavy Pet Peep nel tuo appartamento e che il divertimento abbia inizio. Puoi controllare il tuo Peep con animazioni e movimenti fatti a posta. Portala fuori dal tuo appartamento come Companion o mettila in mostra nel tuo appartamento dentro la sua scatola Peep-a-Boo. Colleziona tutti quanti e mettili in mostra perché tutti possano vederli![#Legal]

Sweetie Pie te derretirá el corazón y será tu Peep favorito! Más diversión Peep al tres por uno! Lleva a tu Heavy Pet Peep a tu departamento y que empieze la diversión. Puedes controlar a tu Peep con animaciones y movimientos personalizados. Sácalo de tu departamento como Companion o pónlo de muestra en tu departamento en su propia caja Peep-a-Boo. Colecciónalos todos y amontónalos para que los vea todo el mundo![#Legal]
*Not Localised* Home_Object_22 [#Legal]

Sweetie Pie는 사랑스런 새 Peep입니다! 추가 Peep으로 세 가지 즐거움을 누려보세요! Heavy Pet Peep을 아파트로 데려와 신나게 놀아 보세요. 사용자 지정 애니메이션과 모션으로 Peep을 컨트롤할 수 있습니다! 친구처럼 아파트 밖에 데려가거나 Peep-A-Boo 박스에 디스플레이된 Mini-Peep을 아파트에 데려다 놓아보세요. Mini-Peep을 모두 모아 친구들에게 자랑해 보세요!
본 세트에는 하기 아이템이 포함되어 있습니다. 


●Sweetie Peep - 환희의 바이올렛
 ●Sweetie Peep - Static Mini - 환희의 바이올렛
 ●Sweetie Peep - Heavy Pet - 환희의 바이올렛


※ 상기 모든 아이템들은 이 번들 구입과 동시에 적절한 카테고리에서 이용할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]

Sweetie Pie will melt your heart as your favorite new Peep! It's three for one with extra Peep fun! Bring your Heavy Pet Peep into your apartment and let the fun begin. You can control your Peep with custom animations and moves. Take her outside of your apartment as a Companion or place her on display in your apartment in his Peep-a-Boo box. Collect them all and stack them for all to see!
This set includes the following items.


・Sweetie Peep - Vavoom Violet
 ・Sweetie Peep - Static Mini - Vavoom Violet
 ・Sweetie Peep - Heavy Pet - Vavoom Violet


※ All of the above items will become available in their relevant categories on purchasing this bundle. [#Legal]

Sweetie Pie會溶化您的心，成為您的Peep新寵！給您特別的Peep樂趣！帶Heavy PetPeep進入您家，盡情享樂。您可以用自訂動態和動作來控制Peep。她可以作為隨身夥伴和您一起外出，或者您可以將她放進專用Peep-A-Boo盒子，成為家居擺設。集齊全套，向朋友炫耀一下吧！本組合包含以下商品：


●Sweetie Peep - 極光紫
 ●Sweetie Peep 靜態迷你公仔 - 極光紫
 ●Sweetie Peep - Heavy Pet - 極光紫


※ 購買組合包後，以上所有物品都會加入相關的類別中。[#Legal]
